titles: A letter from Colonell Harvie, to His Excellency Robert Earle of Essex. Novemb. 10. 1643. It is his Excellencies pleasure that this letter be forthwith printed. John Baldwyn, Secretary to his Excellency.
author: Harvey, Edmund, 1594-1673.
publisher: Printed for John Wright in the Old-bailey,
notes: An account of Prince Rupert's attack on Newport 4 Nov., 1643.
Signed and dated at end: Oulny Novemb. 6. 1643. Edmond Harvey.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Essex, Robert Devereux, --  Earl of, 1591-1646 --  Early works to 1800.
